Package.Description: EvaTRiP (Evaluation Tools for River environmental Planning) are developed by Aqua Restoration Research Center in PWRI(National Research and Development Agency Public Works Research Institute),Masahiko Sekine Dr.Eng. Professor of Yamaguchi University, Norio Tanaka Dr.Eng. Professor of Saitama University and Junji Yagisawa Dr.Eng Associate Professor of Saitama University.
